title: GROW lettuce at home | How to grow lettuce at home

tasks.task: Grow romaine lettuce from supermarket-bought lettuce
subtasks: Cut the romaine lettuce 5 centimeters from the base
Save the remaining lettuce for the fridge
Use toothpicks to secure the cut base of the lettuce
Place the lettuce in a jar filled with water
Position the jar in a sunny location for quick growth
Change the water every 1-2 days to keep it clean
After about three weeks, transplant the lettuce to soil for better taste

tasks.task: Transplant the water-grown lettuce to soil
subtasks: Fill a container with organic all-purpose soil
Make a planting hole for the lettuce (approx. 5 cm deep)
Carefully place the lettuce into the hole
Gently press the soil around the lettuce
Water the soil to keep it moist

tasks.task: Prepare a simple lime-based salad dressing
subtasks: Mix lime juice with olive oil, vegetable broth, and pepper
